TableField.name: CountryID
TableField.phrase: Country ID|An internal ID number to identify a country

TableField.name: CountryName
TableField.phrase: Country Name|The name of the country in this site's default language

TableField.name: NativeCountryName
TableField.phrase: Native Country Name|The name of the country in its native language

TableField.name: CountryAbbreviation
TableField.phrase: Country Abbreviation|The internationally recognized abbreviation of the country name

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Country
CombinedField.phrase: Country|A combined field used to associate this country with another record

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a country

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a country

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
